keyword: how many calories in hot chocolate
title: How Many Calories Are in Hot Chocolate?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in hot chocolate for a standard cup, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations like low-fat options.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Hot Chocolate?
assumptions: Standard 8 oz (240 ml) serving prepared with whole milk and cocoa mix; no added sugar, whipped cream, or marshmallows.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by milk type, brand of mix, added sweeteners, and serving size. Check product labels for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: A standard cup of hot chocolate provides about 190 kcal, with 25 g carbs and 8 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged products.

tweaks.label: Made with skim milk instead of whole

faqs.q: How many calories in hot chocolate with whole milk?
faqs.a: About 190 kcal per 8 oz cup using standard assumptions.

faqs.q: Is hot chocolate high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 23 g sugars per cup from milk and mix.

faqs.q: How many calories in low-fat hot chocolate?
faqs.a: Around 140 kcal if made with skim milk.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a cup of hot chocolate?
faqs.a: Approximately 8 g, mostly from the milk.
